name: Baldur's Gate Pale
description: A brew from the Cutlass in Luskan.

name: Baldur's Gate Red Ale
description: A red ale sold at Port Llast.

name: Belbuck
description: A transulent green, spearmint beer favored by halflings.

name: Bitter Black
description: This heavy beer tastes best when served at cellar temperatures. Arabellans look down upon anyone drinking it at a different temperature. Bitter Black has a dark black color with a thick head of deep brown foam.

name: Black Bottom
description: An ale with a rough-edged, smoky taste.

name: Dragon's Breath Beer
description: This beer has a strong and harsh flavor. It is best served with dark rye bread and death cheese.

name: Elminster's Choice
description: This dark beer has a thick head and is clouded with yeast. It has a smokey aftertaste.

name: Golden Sands Basic
description: The purest form of the Golden Sands lagers, this brew did not contain any additional flavorings. It has a light yellow coloration.

name: Golden Sands Gold
description: This lager contains flavor from select cacti and nettles, adding a distinctly sharp taste to the drink. It has a deep golden color.

name: Golden Sands Orange
description: Orange and currant are used to flavor this lager, giving it a slightly acidic aftertaste. This lager is the sweetest of the Golden Sands brews.

name: Iriaeboran North Brew
description: It has a dark amber color combined with a bitter aftertaste. Iriaeborans call this the "bite of the north winds."

name: Luiren's Best
description: A sweet black, thick stout brewed by the Smokardin clan on the coast of Luiren. It is said to be a nice combination with nut cheese.

name: Old One Eye
description: Similar to the brews from Calimshan, this brew has a light coloring but a higher alcohol content compared to its northern counterparts. Old One Eye has a red coloration that develops during the brewing process. The aftertaste is decidedly hot due to its secret ingredients.

name: Samman
description: Samman ale has bitter flavor and is brown in color.

name: Shadowdark ale
description: An ale brewed in Shadowdale with a dark brown cloudy bubbling appearance and a yellow foamy head. Light and bitter in taste.

name: Sleeping Dragon dark
description: Made from the local oats and barley and has a nutty flavor with a pleasant bite.

name: Slow Spout
description: A Duergan ale that is thick and bitter. It is so named because it tended to swirl around in one's insides until it is "spouted" back up.

name: Spruce beer
description: An alcoholic beverage made from the spruce tree.

name: Suzale
description: Also known as Purple Dragon ale, is a fine-quality nutty ale.

name: Tanagyr's Stout
description: A heavy black beverage with a malty flavor. It is on par with Evermead when considering its headiness.

name: Wizard's Quaff
description: A locally brewed, low-quality drink. Its only redeeming feature is that it is free to those staying in the inn.

name: Wyrmwizz
description: It is an extremely low quality, muddy beverage.
